query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `recruiter_notification_preferences` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `newApplications` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `applicationStatusChanges` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `applicationFrequency` enum('immediate','daily','weekly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'immediate',
  `interviewScheduled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `interviewReminders` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `interviewCompleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `panelistResponses` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `candidateFeedback` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `panelistFeedbackSubmitted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `weeklyDigest` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `systemUpdates` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `marketingEmails` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `userId` (`userId`)
);

  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `newApplications` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `applicationStatusChanges` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `applicationFrequency` enum('immediate','daily','weekly') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'immediate',
  `interviewScheduled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `interviewReminders` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `interviewCompleted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `panelistResponses` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `candidateFeedback` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `panelistFeedbackSubmitted` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `weeklyDigest` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  `systemUpdates` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `marketingEmails` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  UNIQUE KEY `userId` (`userId`)
);
